description: TemplateInstanceRequester holds the identity of an agent requesting a template instantiation.

extra.description: extra holds additional information provided by the authenticator.

groups.description: groups represent the groups this user is a part of.

uid.description: uid is a unique value that identifies this user across time; if this user is deleted and another user by the same name is added, they will have different UIDs.

username.description: username uniquely identifies this user among all active users.
